snippet: Lansing, Mich. and Portland, Me., are among cities that legalized possession of small amounts of the drug, while Colorado approved a tax on recreational marijuana.
abstract: Marijuana proponents score significant victories as voters around the country pass ballot measures decriminalizing marijuana possession and approve regulatory taxes on the drug; voters in Colorado back a heavy tax on recreational marijuana and voters in Portland, Me, and three Michigan cities pass measures legalizing marijuana possession.
lead_paragraph: Lansing, Mich. and Portland, Me., are among cities that legalized possession of small amounts of the drug, while Colorado approved a tax on recreational marijuana.

headline.main: Measures to Legalize Marijuana Are Passed
headline.print_headline: Measures To Legalize Marijuana Are Passed
